result.execSummary:
The defendant Izavier L Wiley was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Attempt Armed Robbery with Threat of Force [Modifiers: Party to a Crime], a class C felony, Wisconsin Statutes 943.32(2).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Pay DNA surcharge, all aplicable mandatory surcharges, fees, assessments and costs.
To be paid through collection by DOC from 25% of funds under Sec. 973.05(4)(b) and as a condition of Extended Supervision.  Any amount remaining due and owing is subject to civil judgment.
*Restitution set at zero.

Consecutive to: Consecutive to any other time being served.
Defendant is eligible for the Challenge Incarceration Program only after serving the first 18 months of this sentence.

superMiscConds.notes:
Obtain/maintain full time employment or full time school and part time employment.
Participate in vocational thinking program-optional if defendant interested.
Obtain GED or HSED.

No drug dealing or association with drug community, drug users/dealers or drug houses.
No new law violations rising to the level of probable cause.
No contact with victim Manda D.

Cooperate with any and all rules set forth by the probation agent.
Partciipate in cognitive thinking program.
Pay all supervision fees.
Obtain AODA assessment. Successfully complete follow up treatment.  Cooperate with random urine screens.

supervisions.notes:
Provide a DNA sample, pay surcharge.
Pursuant to Wisconsin Statutes Section 973.176, the Court advised the defendant of the following restrictions: firearm possession and voting.

charges.descr: Armed Robbery with Threat of Force

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Izavier L Wiley

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Attorney James Eric Goldmann in court, defendant Izavier L Wiley not in court, in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Matter before court for sentencing hearing.  Defense counsel is in trial in another court and requests another sentencing date. No objection from the state. Case adjourned to Branch 21.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for February 5, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney James Eric Goldmann in court, defendant Izavier L Wiley not in court, in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Sentencing hearing.  The state is unable to proceed on today as the state was unable to notify the victim of today's hearing.  New date selected with the parties.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for January 26, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Izavier L Wiley in court with attorney James Eric Goldmann.  Defendant Izavier L Wiley in custody.  Benjamin Lindsay appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, plead GUILTY and was examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights and Addendum received and filed.  Parties stipulate to the complaint as a factual basis for the plea.  Defendant further advised that if he is not a US citizen deportation is possible.  Court found defendant guilty as charged in the Information and ordered entry of Judgment of Conviction.  Matter adjourned for Sentencing.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for December 18, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney James Eric Goldmann in court.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Status conference held between counsel.  Parties engaged in settlement negotiations.  Defense requests date for possible resolution of this matter.  Plea hearing scheduled for December 11, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Andrew Joel Golden in court, defendant Izavier L Wiley not in court, in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Matter before court for status of counsel.  Defense counsel waives defendant's appearance for purposes of today's proceedings.  Defense needs additional time to review discovery and requests another status conference date. Court ordered case adjourned to Branch 21.  Status conference scheduled for November 4, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Izavier L Wiley in court with attorney Megan L. Morrisey.  Defendant Izavier L Wiley in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Plea hearing.  Defense has discovered a conflict of interest in this matter.  Defense motion to withdraw heard and granted by the Court.  Attorney Morrisey to notify the public defender's office of the need for successor counsel.  Status conference scheduled for October 15, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Megan L. Morrisey in court, defendant Izavier L Wiley not in court, in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Matter calendared for Plea Hearing.  Branch 21 presiding over jury trial in an unrelated matter and unable to hear this case.   Parties advised that spin court not available; new date selected with the parties.  Plea hearing scheduled for October 1, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Megan L. Morrisey in court, defendant Izavier L Wiley not in court, in custody.  Megan Patricia Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Status conference held between counsel.  Parties engaged in settlement negotiations.  Defense requests date for possible resolution of this matter.  Plea hearing scheduled for August 13, 2014 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Megan L Morrisey in court, defendant Izavier L Wiley not in court, in custody.  Megan P Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.

Status conference held between counsel.  Parties engaged in settlement negotiations.  Status conference scheduled for July 10, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Megan L Morrisey in court, defendant Izavier L Wiley not in court, in custody.  Megan P Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: dds.
Scheduling conference held between counsel.  Parties engaged in plea negotiations.  Defense awaiting additional discovery.  Status conference scheduled for June 23, 2014 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Izavier L Wiley in court with attorney Megan L Morrisey.  Defendant Izavier L Wiley in custody.  Randy Sitzberger for Megan P Carmody appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound Defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Brash, Branch 21.   Original Information received and filed.  Copy given to Defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant was arraigned in open court and pled not guilty.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 14, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with Manda D.

Defendant Izavier L Wiley in court with attorney Megan L. Morrisey.  Defendant Izavier L Wiley in custody.  Carole R. Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Brash, Branch 21.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  
DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 15, 2014 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
